thread.section_title: Doheny's Pool Supplies Fast Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Doheny's Pool Supplies Fast | www.doheny.com
thread.title: Jack Marks
thread.title_full: Doheny's Pool Supplies Fast reviewed by Jack Marks

author: Jack Marks
title: Jack Marks
text: I don't know about the 15 degrees improvement. This time of year, February, I am getting a 2 or 3 degree improvement. The cover comes in a shape, and then we begin to trim it, a little at a time. Right now it completely covers our oval pool, and goes around the hot tub, with a separate piece for the hot tub. We have a spillway between the two, so we cut out a small flap so that the water goes under the cover and not on top of it.
